Plot: Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.
Title: Purple Noon
Writer: Patricia Highsmith (novel), René Clément (adaptation), Paul Gégauff (adaptation)
Actors: Alain Delon, Maurice Ronet, Marie Laforêt, Erno Crisa
